title: Elementary Language Education Curriculum Development Based on Learning Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational literacy skills and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Providing a structured learning design environment using a model-based development approach. Activity-centered composition to promote learner engagement

learning_goals: Can explain the basic components of a learning design model (activity types, roles, resources).
Can design simple learning scenarios using DSML (Domain-Specific Modeling Language).
Can convert developed learning designs into activity worksheets applicable in offline settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
